required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of PLM60 in Subjects With Relapsed Small-cell Lung Cancer After Platinum-based First-Line Chemotherapy
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Multi-center, Phase 2 Study of Liposome-entrapped Mitoxantrone Hydrochloride Injection (PLM60) in Subjects With Relapsed Small-cell Lung Cancer After Platinum-based First-Line Chemotherapy

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open, multicenter phase II clinical study for PLM60. The primary aim of the study is to observe the initial efficacy of PLM60 in treatment of small cell lung cancer. The secondary aim is to explore the safety and PK characteristics of PLM60

primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 year
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate ORR in SCLC subjects treated with PLM60

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 year
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate DoR in SCLC subjects treated with PLM60

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 year
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate DCR in SCLC subjects treated with PLM60

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 year
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate PFS in SCLC subjects treated with PLM60

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 year
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate OS in SCLC subjects treated with PLM60

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 year
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety profiles in SCLC subjects treated with PLM60

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion, an average of 2 year
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the safety profiles in SCLC subjects treated with PLM60

arm_group.description: 20 mg/m2, 4 weeks/cycle, administered on day 1 of each cycle
15mg/m2, 3 weeks/cycle, administered on day 1 of each cycle

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Medicine, CSPC Clinical Development Division
